Disease All Friendly

spell id [id]: 102
effect number [effect_number]: 11
damage [damage]: 1
spec [spec]: 140737492553856
casting time [casttime]: 100%
area of effect [aoe_s]: 100% of battlefield
number of effects [nreff]: 1
Cause Affliction: Disease
 
(Armor Negating [armornegating], Magic Resistance Negates [mrnegates], Affects Friendlies Only [enemyimmune], Does not affect user unless hitting x% of battlefield [userimmune])
The caster transforms an entire army into skeletal beings, making them highly resistant to piercing attacks. The transformation can be harmful and the transformed soldiers might get diseased by the spell. High magic resistance will protect the affected soldiers from the disease. The caster is exempt from the effects of the spell
